amendatorysection.para: On and after July 1, and until the adoption of the budget by the county board in September, the county board may expend any balance of cash on hand in any fund for the current expenses of the county payable from such fund, but not to exceed such proportion of the total amount expended under the last budget for such fund in the equivalent period of the prior budget year to the total amount budgeted for such fund. Such expenditures shall be charged against the appropriation for such fund as provided in the budget when adopted.
